text: A Heart in Winter () is a 1992 French romantic drama movie directed by Claude Sautet and starring Daniel Auteuil, Emmanuelle Béart, André Dussollier, Élizabeth Bourgine, Brigitte Catillon, Myriam Boyer, Jean-Claude Bouillaud. It was nominated for 1 BAFTA in 1994. == Other websites == * * Category:1992 romantic drama movies Category:French romance movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Claude Sautet
title: A Heart in Winter
